about_the_game:
In “The Cow Game” you play as a brave cow in search of her stolen calf. On your journey you will encounter many dangers. Sometimes you have to choose risky paths. You decide where your path leads. Can you cross the plans of the mysterious cow-lt or will you fall into madness?


YOU ARE A COW
Slip into the unique perspective of a cow that relentlessly wants to save her calf. You can call out and your calf will answer you. Follow its voice to avoid losing it. But be careful! There are many dangers ahead, that are too great for you as a cow and force you to find creative solutions to reach your goal.


EXPLORE THE WORLD
While exploring the low poly world, you can find different hidden objects. Make friends with other animals and find out more about the strange artifacts that are scattered throughout the world.


SOLVE PUZZLES
There are obstacles in your way. Can you overcome them to follow your destiny? If you are kind and willing to help others, they might return the favor and help you to complete your journey.


MULTIPLE ENDINGS
Your decisions count! Are you risky or cautious? Determined or hesitant? Do you explore a lot or do you want to get to your destination as quick as possible? Embark on a mystical adventure with an unknown outcome.


"The Cow Game" was created by a four person team during a 48h Game Jam. Since then we've been working on it together with our interns Jannis, Natascha, Marc, Lea, Martin, Ariana and Junes. Thanks to Fabi for helping out with some coding. Mikolai Music also did a great job on the Sound Design. Thanks everyone. You did an amazing job!

content_descriptors.notes: Mild and implied violence against animals and their possible death in low poly optic.
